author: rhuijben
msg: In JavaHL: Introduce a bit more SharpSvn magic: create a per request wc_ctx and
register some cleanup helpers to avoid leaving dangling pointers.
(A NULL pointer is far easier to diagnose than some invalid pointer)
Todays patches should allow clients like Subclipse to work with 1.7 without
code changes, instead of breaking down on locked wc.db files.
(ClientContextClientContext): Destroy the wc_ctx. Register client name.
(ClientContext): Rename persistentCtx to m_context to match other code and
because it lost its persistent vs normal status a long time ago.

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-3713] Replacing explicit InitialContext calls with reflection code

author: coheigea
msg: Backmerging some of the ModifiedRequestTest changes to 1.5.x-fixes.
